name: TC6_15_cities_clustered
description: TC6 - Clustered layout: 15-location TSP with 3 distinct geographic clusters

clusters.name: Cụm Đông (Bình Thạnh, Thủ Đức, Q2)
Cụm Tây Nam (Q5, Q6, Q7, Q11)

coordinates.name: Chợ Bến Thành
coordinates.address: Lê Lợi, Phường Bến Thành, Quận 1, TP.HCM

coordinates.name: Dinh Độc Lập
coordinates.address: 135 Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa, Quận 1, TP.HCM

coordinates.name: Landmark 81
coordinates.address: 720A Điện Biên Phủ, Bình Thạnh, TP.HCM

coordinates.name: Gigamall
coordinates.address: 240-242 Phạm Văn Đồng, Thủ Đức, TP.HCM

coordinates.name: Vincom Mega Mall Thảo Điền
coordinates.address: 159 Xa Lộ Hà Nội, Quận 2, TP.HCM

coordinates.name: The Vista An Phú
coordinates.address: 628C Xa Lộ Hà Nội, Quận 2, TP.HCM

coordinates.name: Chợ Lớn
coordinates.address: Hải Thượng Lãn Ông, Quận 5, TP.HCM

coordinates.name: Aeon Mall Tân Phú
coordinates.address: 30 Bờ Bao Tân Thắng, Tân Phú, TP.HCM

cluster_characteristics.optimal_strategy: Visit all locations within each cluster before moving to next cluster

expected_results.route_description: Trung Tâm → Đông → Tây Nam → Depot

test_purpose: Clustered TSP - Fragmented search space with geographic grouping

performance_metrics.cluster_penalty: Poor cluster ordering increases distance by ~40%

algorithm_challenges: Avoid premature convergence to suboptimal cluster order
validation_notes: Optimal solution should minimize inter-cluster transitions
Within-cluster routes should be locally optimal
Test algorithms' ability to discover hierarchical structure
notes: Tests algorithm robustness with clustered layout - Common in real delivery scenarios where locations are grouped by district/area
